actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: Recognizing the 100th anniversary of the American Thoracic Society, celebrating its achievements, and encouraging the society to continue its guidance on lung-related health issues to the peoples of the United States and of the world.

summary.text: Recognizes the American Thoracic Society on its 100th anniversary for its scientific, clinical, and public health achievements and its impact on improving lung-related health.

titles.title: Recognizing the 100th anniversary of the American Thoracic Society, celebrating its achievements, and encouraging the society to continue its guidance on lung-related health issues to the peoples of the United States and of the world.
